content.question: Scholars believe that the vessel was most likely used in a ritual context for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: It was discovered inside a cave, alongside votive figurines.
It was found in the ruins of an ancestral shrine.
It was deposited in a sacred well associated with a fertility goddess.
It was buried in a cemetery, underneath an artificial mound.

content.answer: It was buried in a cemetery, underneath an artificial mound.

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
